auth.signup.title: Enter a email and password
auth.signup.link: For activate your account, you must click on the link present in email just to send you.
auth.signup.contact: Please, if you occur an error with it, contact us.
auth.signup.activated: Your account is activated, now you can sign in
auth.signin.title: Enter your credentials
auth.signin.lostPwd.title: Have you lost your Password ?
auth.signin.lostPwd.line1: With this page you can get a new password,
auth.signin.lostPwd.line2: just follow the process and click on next button
auth.signin.lostPwd.step1.line1: Please, to generate an new password for your account,
